scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -o -name .next -o -name dist -o -name .turbo -o -name .contentlayer -type d -prune | xargs rm -rf
scripts.email: cross-env OP_ACCOUNT=iforge.1password.com op run --env-file=config/anvil/.env.development.tpl -- pnpm --filter anvil-2 exec email preview src/email/templates
scripts.email-check: cross-env OP_ACCOUNT=iforge.1password.com op run --env-file=config/anvil/.env.development.tpl -- pnpm --filter anvil-2 exec email check
